headline: J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) Slid Due to Sluggish Freight Cycle And Below-Expected Guidance
summary: Parnassus Investments, an investment management company, released the “Parnassus Mid Cap Growth Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Fund (Investor Shares) returned 13.29% (net of fees) in the quarter, compared to the Russell Midcap Growth Index’s 18.20% return. Stock selection in the Industrials and Information […]
